mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report (userId, type, lon, lat, comment, imageUrl, status, weight, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES (#{userId}, #{type}, #{lon}, #{lat}, #{comment}, #{imageUrl}, #{status}, #{weight}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
